name: Self Aid Arcade
description:
WORKOUT IN VR!!!! Self Aid Arcade is a Virtual Reality exercise app full of mini games designed to give you a workout! Download the gym.apk and load it onto your Oculus Quest to start working out!

CURRENT VERSION: 1 minute rope climb, climb as high as you can in 1 minute (Shoulder Workout).  10M Wall Climb, how fast can you climb a 10 meter wall? (Shoulders and Back Workout).  

COMING SOON:  Squat Jump (Leg Workout), Archery Range (Shoulders and Arms Workout), Row Boat (Back  Workout).  

FEEDBACK  & SUGGESTIONS: Self Aid Arcade is a work in progress and we need your help to make it great! If you have feedback or suggestions for future versions of Self Aid Arcade we'd love to hear from you. You can fill out our feedback form: https://forms.gle/BeyHbhwuRtNKgV1t8 or comment down below.
